title: [Diamond Post] The blacklist is for the weak & petty.
body:
As of lately, i've seen alot of discussion about the FEK blacklist function and its use towards certain posters on these boards...

I just have to say, if you resort to blacklisting because you can't win an argument or can't defend yourself then you just suck lol. You are never gonna go far in the real world and you are gonna die a lonely loser. So ye just putting this out there.
